constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 141 (Friday, August 6, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Texas:
H.R. 4957.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Necessary and Proper Clause (Art. 1, Sec. 8, Cl. 18)
[Page H4320]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations to require the announcement of the penalty for interference with cabin or flight crew, and for other purposes.
